summary: Completed E2E testing of Booka booking app - authentication, authorization, and admin flows. Fixed MongoDB ObjectId serialization bug in business owner registration. All 19 backend tests pass, all UI flows verified.

fixed.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error causing 500 Internal Server Error when registering business owners
fixed.fix: Added remove_mongo_id() call before returning business object in registration response

test_credentials.test_customer: Dynamic unique emails used for testing
test_credentials.test_business: Dynamic unique emails used for testing

seed_data_creation: Test users and businesses created during testing with unique UUIDs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core authentication and authorization flows are working. Business owner registration was fixed (ObjectId serialization). Admin can approve/reject businesses. Customers can browse approved businesses. MOCKED: Subscription and payment systems are UI placeholders only - no actual Stripe integration.
verified_flows: Business Owner signup and login - WORKING (after fix)
Customer can browse approved businesses - WORKING
Admin view businesses and pending approvals - WORKING
Logout functionality for all user types - WORKING

mocked_apis.subscriptions: UI placeholder only - no Stripe integration
mocked_apis.payments_refunds: UI placeholder only - no actual payment processing
